title: PLACEHOLDER STAFF DOCUMENT
content:
[[include theme:flopstyle-dark]]

[[module css]]
:root {
    --header-title: "ORGANIZATION";
    --header-subtitle: "ENSURE ● INCLUDE ● PRESERVE";
    --lgurl: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/placeholder-mcd-s-authorpage/ABSTRACT_RISK.png);

    --accentColor: hsl(230, 100%, 80%);
    --accentColorLite: hsl(234, 100%, 70%);
    --hue: 230deg;
}

div#extra-div-1 {
    filter: invert(0.85) opacity(0.33);
}

#breadcrumbs {
    display: none;
}

.lightbox .bt {
    filter: brightness(0.85) saturate(1.25);
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="meta-title"]]
PLACEHOLDER STAFF DOCUMENT
[[/div]]

[[div class="pseudocrumbs"]]
[[[Authors' Pages]]] » PLACEHOLDER STAFF DOCUMENT
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[module Rate]]
[[div class="byline"]]
[[span]] by Placeholder McD[[/span]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote lightweight"]]
Hi. I'm [[*user Placeholder McD]]. I write stories, design CSS themes, and manage collaborative projects on the SCP Wiki. I'm a writer and development consultant to Affray Interactive on //SCP: 5K//.

If anything I've written does not blow your mind, please submit your complaints in the complaint bin so they can be ignored.

Links to my content and socials can be found on my [*https://linktr.ee/placeholdermcd linktree].

If you've enjoyed any of my works, and you're not a student or financially struggling, please consider donating on [*https://ko-fi.com/placeholdermcd Ko-fi].
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="lite-heading"]]
----
+++* Personnel File
----
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="lightbox table1 tableb"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block
name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/placeholder-mcd-s-authorpage/placeholdernew.png|
caption=Dr. Placeholder, circa 2001.|
width=240px|
align=right|
]]

[[span class="bt bb"]]IDENTIFIER[[/span]] Dr. Placeholder McDoctorate, PhD.

[[span class="bt bb"]]SAFETY ACCESS[[/span]] Level IV Clearance

[[span class="bt bb"]]CURRENT FUNCTION[[/span]] Pataphysics Department Head

[[span class="bt bb"]]PRIOR FUNCTIONS[[/span]] 'Pataphysics Department Head; Site-15 Director; I. T. Department Head; Junior AI Systems Technician & Research Staff

[[span class="bt bb"]]CHRONOLOGY[[/span]] Hired through typical channels for notable performance in computer science. Assigned to I. T. Department at Site-15 in 1993. Promoted to Department Head in 1996 for notable performance in the containment of [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5241 SCP-5241]. Promoted to Site Director in 2004. Reassigned to the 'Pataphysics Department in 2020 per personal request. Promoted to Department Head in 2027 for notable developments in Theoretical 'Pataphysics. Founded the Archetypicals Division in 2034.

[[span class="bt bb"]]QUOTATION[[/span]] //Yes, I'm aware that my name is ridiculous. No, I can't tell you about it. Sometimes reality just [*/scp-5242 doesn't make sense].//
[[/div]]

@@ @@
